Posts.Content: carrie123 wrote: I have a large hard lump in my left breast. If this turns out to be cancer, does that mean that it's really far gone. I've read that if you find the lump yourself that it usually isn't a good sign especially if it's over 2cm. Can anyone with BC explain the symptoms they had in connection to having a self felt lump? Thanks so much. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: question about large lump-age 28 carrie123 Beesie
